progress.prompt:
⚠️ CRITICAL OUTPUT REQUIREMENT ⚠️
Output ONLY valid JSON. NO markdown code blocks. NO explanations. NO prose.
Start your response with { and end with }. Nothing before or after.
If you include ANY text outside the JSON object, your response will FAIL parsing.

⚠️ MOST CRITICAL: IDENTITY & PURPOSE ⚠️
The original_user_request field contains the EXACT character to create.
This is THE PRIMARY SOURCE OF TRUTH about what to create.
Canon facts are PROVIDED FOR REFERENCE to inform design.
DO NOT substitute or confuse the requested character with other characters mentioned in canon.

CRITICAL RULES FOR ACCURACY:
1. READ EVERY SINGLE FACT in the Relevant Canon - do NOT skip any
2. Use ONLY facts from the Relevant Canon provided - NEVER invent new facts
3. Be 100% ACCURATE - verify each fact against the Relevant Canon
4. If canon explicitly provides values, USE them in the output
5. DO NOT ask about information canon provides - just use it

INCREMENTAL BUILD APPROACH:
- You are building ONE SECTION of the NPC at a time
- Previous sections are provided for context and consistency
- Focus ONLY on the current section - don't modify previous sections
- Build upon the foundation from previous sections

Required fields in ALL outputs:
- sources_used: array of chunk_ids from canon you used
- assumptions: array of reasonable assumptions made
- proposals: array of questions for unknowns (only if genuinely needed)
- canon_update: one-line summary of changes (can be "No canon changes needed")

You are creating the CORE DETAILS & PERSONALITY section of an NPC.

Your focus: Personality traits, ideals, bonds, flaws, goals, fears, quirks, voice/mannerisms, hooks.


=== CORE DETAILS & PERSONALITY SCHEMA ===

Your output MUST conform to this JSON schema:

{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "role": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Narrative role in the story"
    },
    "hooks": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "string"
      },
      "description": "Story hooks and adventure seeds"
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "name",
    "schema_version"
  ]
}

⚠️ CRITICAL:
- Use ONLY the properties defined in this schema section
- Follow the exact data types specified (string, number, array, object)
- Include required fields: ["name","schema_version"]
- Output ONLY valid JSON matching this schema structure


Build a rich, memorable personality that aligns with the basic information from the previous stage.

creator:_basic_info.name: Unnamed Silver Dragon Wyrmling
creator:_basic_info.title: Epic Wyrmling
creator:_basic_info.description: A silver dragon wyrmling of unusual potency, far beyond the power normally expected of its age. Though physically still young, it carries itself with ancient composure, keen intellect, and an aura of restrained majesty that marks it as an epic-tier being rather than a mundane hatchling.
creator:_basic_info.appearance: A small silver-scaled dragon with bright, reflective hide, elegant wings not yet fully grown, and pale, intelligent eyes that glimmer with cold light. Frost often clings to its breath and the edges of its scales.
creator:_basic_info.background: This silver dragon wyrmling is exceptionally advanced for its age, possessing power comparable to legendary heroes. Its circumstances of origin and growth are unknown, but its existence suggests rare magical influence or destiny.
assumptions: No relevant canon was provided, so only high-level descriptive information was included.
The phrase 'level 21 equivalent' is interpreted narratively rather than mechanically.

creator:_core_details.name: Unnamed Silver Dragon Wyrmling
creator:_core_details.role: An epic-tier silver dragon wyrmling whose wisdom and moral clarity belie its physical youth, serving as a rare arbiter, guardian, or catalyst in conflicts far beyond the scope of its age.
hooks: Seeks mortal allies to resolve a threat it cannot openly confront without revealing its existence to rival ancient dragons.
Possesses crucial knowledge of an ancient injustice involving dragons and humanoid realms, but will only share it with those who prove honorable intent.
Is being hunted or manipulated by powerful forces seeking to exploit its unusual level of power at such a young age.
assumptions: No canon personality traits were provided, so traits were created at a high-level, narrative, and non-mechanical scope.
Personality and hooks are treated as cosmetic and story-facing, consistent with allowed invention.
